chart.disclaimer: Note: Entries that have the same day as the start and end day will have 1 day added to the end day because they would not render on the chart

messages.refresh_directions: Press Refresh to refresh the page
messages.loading_disclaimer: It'll take a few seconds to load all your data, depending on how large your list is
messages.update_directions: Press update button below to add user
